title: Salt baked potatoes with chorizo mayonnaise and escabeche of vegetables
description: As any crisp lover will assure you, salt and potatoes are a great combination - and baked spuds are no exception. Glynn does his in a salt crust for extra crisp skins and fluffy flesh.
ingredients: 4 medium waxy potatoes, washed, skin on
table salt and cracked black pepper, to season
